SAT 27 MAR 2010

Johnny Haine Memorial Novices´ Hurdle (CLASS 4) (4yo+) Winner £3,253RUK
Soft 2m110y Number of runners: 15

SHOW:
Choose comment type:
Watch race - 50p

Cards help

£5,000 guaranteed For 4yo+, which have not won more than three hurdles Weights 4yo.10st 7lb; 5yo+ 11st Penalties each hurdle won 6lb Allowances fillies and mares 7lb Entries 29 pay £ 25 Penalty value 1st £3,252.50 2nd £955.00 3rd £477.50 4th £238.50
